location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 36: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, suggests that the salaries of Ruzza Ali [Riza Ali Khan], Native Agent at Sharga [Sharjah], and Moolla Hoossein, Agent at Magoo [Bandar-e MoghÅ«yeh], be increased to 150 rupees per month and 50 rupees per month respectively.
